title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST & CLI API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm install ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (pip install ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams answers from local Ollama models.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot wrapper for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama models inside workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client crate for Ollama (crates.io).

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated list of community-tuned models ready to pull into Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Quick-start Docker Compose stack for Ollama + WebUI + GPU support.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template combining Ollama + embeddings + PDF ingestion.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.
